title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1097.10 - Animals barred from terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1097.10 - Animals barred from terminal

State Regulations

No person except a police officer or another person
authorized by LIRR shall enter in a terminal, station or train with any animal
except a seeing eye or hearing ear dog or an animal properly confined for
shipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1097.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
